勝.definition: victory; success; to beat; to defeat; to surpass; victorious; superior to; to get the better of; better than; surpassing; superb (of vista); beautiful (scenery); wonderful (view); (Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear; equal to (a task)

勝不驕，敗不餒.pinyin: sheng4 bu4 jiao1 , bai4 bu4 nei3
勝不驕，敗不餒.definition: no arrogance in victory, no despair in defeat

勝之不武.definition: (fig.) to fight a one-sided battle; to have an unfair advantage in a contest

勝任.definition: qualified; competent (professionally); to be up to a task

勝似.definition: to surpass; better than; superior to

勝出.definition: to come out on top; to win (in an election, contest etc); success; victory

勝率.definition: (sports) win rate; winning percentage; probability of winning

勝算.definition: odds of success; stratagem that ensures success; to be sure of success

勝者王侯敗者寇.pinyin: sheng4 zhe3 wang2 hou2 bai4 zhe3 kou4
勝者王侯敗者寇.definition: the winners become princes and marquises; the losers are vilified as bandits (idiom); history is written by the victors

勝者王侯敗者賊.pinyin: sheng4 zhe3 wang2 hou2 bai4 zhe3 zei2
勝者王侯敗者賊.definition: see 勝者王侯敗者寇|胜者王侯败者寇[sheng4 zhe3 wang2 hou2 bai4 zhe3 kou4]

勝負.definition: victory or defeat; the outcome of a battle
